005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.pidwrappers;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DigitalInput;
008import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DigitalOutput;
009import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource;
010import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSourceType;
011import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Ultrasonic;
012
013/** Wrapper so that PIDSource is implemented for Ultrasonic for old PIDController. */
014public class PIDUltrasonic extends Ultrasonic implements PIDSource {
015  protected PIDSourceType m_pidSource = PIDSourceType.kDisplacement;
016
017  public PIDUltrasonic(int pingChannel, int echoChannel) {
018    super(pingChannel, echoChannel);
019  }
020
021  public PIDUltrasonic(DigitalOutput pingChannel, DigitalInput echoChannel) {
022    super(pingChannel, echoChannel);
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public void setPIDSourceType(PIDSourceType pidSource) {
027    if (!pidSource.equals(PIDSourceType.kDisplacement)) {
028      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Only displacement PID is allowed for ultrasonics.");
029    }
030    m_pidSource = pidSource;
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  public PIDSourceType getPIDSourceType() {
035    return m_pidSource;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Get the range in the inches for the PIDSource base object.
040   *
041   * @return The range in inches
042   */
043  @Override
044  public double pidGet() {
045    return getRangeInches();
046  }
047}
